select seq from TB_CHANNEL where channel_name=#{channel_name} and sender_key=#{sender_key};
mapper.insert: insert into TB_TEMPLATE( template_code, channel_seq, msg, phone, comment ) values( #{template_code}, #{channel_seq}, #{msg}, #{phone}, #{comment} )
insert into TB_LMS( template_code, failback_title, failback_msg, failback_id ) values( #{template_code}, #{failback_title}, #{failback_msg}, #{failback_id} )
mapper.select: select seq from TB_BTN where name=#{name} and url_mobile=#{mobile} and url_pc=#{pc} and url_lms=#{lms}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_BTN( name, url_mobile, url_pc, url_lms ) values( #{name}, #{mobile}, #{pc}, #{lms} )
insert into TB_BTN_LIST( template_code, btn_seq, btn_order ) values( #{template_code}, #{btn_seq}, #{btn_order} )
mapper.select: select count(sub_id) from TB_SUB_ID where sub_id=#{subId}
